skill-javascrip-3: Integration with APIs and data manipulation

tech-javascript-description: Essential programming language for web development, used both on the client-side (frontend) and server-side (backend, with Node.js).
tech-nodejs-description: Essential programming language for web development, used both on the client-side (frontend) and server-side (backend, with Node.js).
tech-react-description: JavaScript library for building dynamic and reactive user interfaces, especially for Single Page Applications (SPA).
tech-angular-description: JavaScript framework for building dynamic and reactive user interfaces, especially for Single Page Applications (SPA).
tech-typescript-description: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and object-oriented features, making the code safer and more scalable.
tech-css-description: Styling language used to describe the presentation of an HTML document, including colors, layouts, and fonts.
tech-html-description: Markup language used to structure content on the web, defining elements like headers, paragraphs, links, and images.
tech-figma-description: Design tool for creating prototypes and user interfaces.
tech-docker-description: Containerization platform that automates the deployment of applications in isolated and portable environments.
tech-php-description: Widely used programming language in web development, especially on the server-side to create dynamic and interactive websites.
tech-sql-description: Structured query language used to manage and query data in relational databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and others.
tech-laravel-description: Robust PHP framework for web application development, focusing on simplicity, elegance, and a clean, modular code structure.
projeto-vitta-clinic-descricao: Management system for medical clinics, with modules for patients, doctors, and receptionists. Docker was used for scalability and flexibility. Challenges include module integration and creating an intuitive interface.
projeto-ponto-da-comida-descricao: Landing page for a healthy restaurant, with simple and responsive design. Focused on user experience on mobile devices, using HTML and CSS.
projeto-spotify-descricao: Responsive clone of the Spotify landing page, with CSS animations and SEO-optimized design. Focused on adapting to different devices.
descricao-sobre-mim: As an experienced software developer, I have refined my skills in development, organization, and software architecture through a variety of projects.
autonomia-front-end: I have consolidated autonomy in front-end development
descricao-back-end: In back-end and databases, I am constantly seeking improvement, with a special focus on creating and integrating APIs.
atualmente-graduacao: Currently, I am completing my graduation and preparing for a postgraduate degree in full-stack web development, in addition to working on personal projects that drive my technical evolution.
